channel.title: Product on stultus notes
channel.description: Recent content in Product on stultus notes

item.title: Minimum Viable Product (MVP)
item.description: A version of a product with just enough features to be usable by early customers.

item.title: Proof of Concept (POC)
item.description: A realization of a certain method or idea to demonstrate its feasibility.

item.title: Prototype
item.description: An early sample or model of a product built to test a concept.
